description:
Demon Go! is a side-scrolling runner action game where players use simple controls to quickly maneuver through various stages.

The road to cat heaven, filled with all the world's kitties, is a rough one. Help the little demon reach the utopia he has longed for!

<Game intro>

▶ Quickly and eagerly, go forward and forward some more!
Use only Jump and Dash to charge forward nonstop! Use these two actions to run away from or defeat the demons to reach kitty heaven!

▶ Action-packed escape featuring a host of gimmicks!
Take advantage of the gimmicks featured on each stage! Jump through the air, blow your enemies away, and more as you use the simple controls to navigate all that action!

▶ Use items to clear stages easier!
Gather all the gold on each stage to unlock a host of items! The hell store sells items with a variety of different abilities. Form your own combination of items to combat each stage!

▶ To utopia with the kitties!
Escape hell with the scattered kitties that have lost their way! Rescued cats follow the little demon to the end of the stage. During your flight through hell, maybe you'll even find a few peculiar ones.
name: Demon Go!
